did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Manuscript copies in ruled journal excerpting essays from various sources including The Philosophical Journal and Advocate of Natural History (June: 1835); the Royal Linnean Society's Minute Book; [Ben] Silliman's Journal; and American Antiquities.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Natural History Extracts, Crerar Ms 140, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript copies in ruled journal excerpting essays from various sources including The Philosophical Journal and Advocate of Natural History (June: 1835); the Royal Linnean Society's Minute Book; [Ben] Silliman's Journal; and American Antiquities. Crerar Manuscripts includes only Volume One, no. 2 out of series of numbered journals. Bound in red buckram.
